location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 17: William Digges Latouche and George Abraham, Officials at Bussora [Basra], to [John Beaumont, Resident at Bushire]

mods.abstract: This letter has no stated recipient, but it would appear to be addressed to John Beaumont, Resident at Bushire. The letter discusses the deposit of fifty-six chests of Venice ware as security. It also informs of the capture of Pondicherry [Puducherry].
